message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the cash flow statement that represents the reduction in assets held for sale (inventory) during the period.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see there is a line item "(Increase) Decrease in Inventory" with a value of "-7783800.00". 

The negative sign indicates this is actually an increase in inventory rather than a decrease. However, the task asks for the "reduction in the amount of assets held for sale" which corresponds to this line item.

The value shown is "-7783800.00", which represents the change in inventory during the period. This is the amount we need to extract as per the task description.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-7783800.00'}}
```
